item.title: Sodbury Area Early Modern Wills
item.description: These wills from Gloucestershire Archives have been transcribed for VCH Gloucestershire by Judy Kimber. They cover Acton Turville, Chipping Sodbury, Little Sodbury, Tormarton, Wapley with Codrington and Yate.
item.dc:creator: JBroadway

item.title: Acton Turville Probate Inventories 1622-1765
item.description: This set of eight probate inventories was transcribed in 2013 by a volunteer at Gloucestershire Archives, in support of ongoing work on the Victoria County History of Gloucestershire.
item.dc:creator: JamesH
